dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1946
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Underscores the importance of Baptismal vows as the foundation of the lay apostolate, including lay retreat houses. Describes an ideal structure for lay communities. Also decries the warehousing of mental patients in "vast concentration camps of human misery." Begs for more men's clothes.
